name: Throne Run
description:
A multiplayer mad race for the Throne of the kingdom. 

The  game is currently under development. This is the very first attempt to get the things working . Currently, I'm the only  one who is working on the develpment. So, things will go slowly.

The game seems   work nicely online (matchmaking). It also has the ability to create local servers and training mode (boring mode).

Known bug: After playing online (matchmaking) if you try to play solo or local the game crashses.  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Easy controlled game.

 - PC - 

<Left> - Goes to the Left
<Right> - Goes to the Rigth
<Spacebar>- Uses the current spell

 - ANDROID - 

<Tap on the left part of the screen> - Goes to the Left
<Tap on the right part of the screen> - Goes to the Right
<Tap on the upper part of the screen> - Uses the current spell

Easy... uh?

Roadmap:

- Fullscreen, settings and options
- Save preferences/customizations
- Randomly generated maps
- Music and sound effects
- Customize your character
- Hi-scores
- Private matches
- Cross-platform support (this is already achieved for multiplayer, but, I need to polish the app a bit)
